item.description:
Current Agenda:

6:00pm Pizza
6:30pm Presentations:


  • Joe Henriques from Sitecore will discuss (20min) the new CMS version 6.3 and Sitecore's recent work with Microsoft and the Azure platform.
  • Ozell McBride will present a 30min talk on the philosophies of Workflow and Security relative to a large Sitecore install - This is not a re-hash of the manuals, it's a pragmatic discussion on what works.
  • Rick Cabral will present a 30min demonstration on using the Security API for on-the-fly impersonation, as well as programmatic workflow state modification. - If you have to lash up to a 3rd party authentication system, you'll want to evaluate this option.


8:00pm Adjurn to Characters, down the street
item.name: Sitecore 6.3 conversation | Security and Workflow demonstrations
